Package backend

Class TokenManager

java.lang.Object
backend.TokenManager
public class TokenManager extends Object
The TokenManager class manages user tokens and their associated user IDs.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final Map<String,Integer>
    TokentoUserID
    Reverse lookup HashMap to store the token as the key and the associated user ID as the value.
    private static final Map<Integer,String>
    userIDtoToken
    HashMap to store the user ID as the key and the associated token as the value.

      private static final Map<Integer,String> userIDtoToken
      HashMap to store the user ID as the key and the associated token as the value.

      private static final Map<String,Integer> TokentoUserID
      Reverse lookup HashMap to store the token as the key and the associated user ID as the value.

  • Constructor Details

    • TokenManager

      public TokenManager()

  • Method Details

    • addToken

      public static void addToken(int userID, String token)
      Adds a token and its associated user ID to the manager.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID to associate with the token.
      token - The token to be added.

    • getToken

      public static String getToken(int userID)
      Retrieves the token associated with the given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID for which to retrieve the token.
      Returns:
      The token associated with the user ID, or null if no token is found.

    • getUserID

      public static int getUserID(String token)
      Retrieves the user ID associated with the given token.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to retrieve the ID.
      Returns:
      The user ID associated with the token, or 0 if the token is not found.

    • containsToken

      public static boolean containsToken(String token)
      Checks if the TokenManager contains the given token.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to check for.
      Returns:
      True if the token is found in the TokenManager, otherwise false.

    • removeToken

      public static void removeToken(int userId)
      Removes all tokens associated with the given user ID from the manager.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID for which to remove all tokens.
